radiographic_examinations.findings: Anterior and anteroseptal wall hypokinesis, large area of late gadolinium enhancement, presence of myocardial edema.

radiographic_examinations.date: Three and a half years after first myocardial infarction
radiographic_examinations.findings: Fixed septal defect consistent with chronic myocardial infarction.
Two discrete areas of late gadolinium enhancement, anterior wall lesion more intense than inferior wall lesion, and presence of myocardial edema.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Myocardial edema consistent with acute infarction in the inferior wall, chronic infarction in the anterior wall.
